Question: Sometimes a person has a fear of water or a dislike of being wet, it is still important to make sure they are having a bath why?
Options: A. flooding B. drowning C. wet skin D. get wet E. rash

E. rash

Even if a person has a fear of water or dislikes being wet, it is still important to ensure they are having a bath because not bathing can lead to skin issues such as rashes. Proper hygiene through regular bathing helps maintain skin health and prevents the buildup of bacteria and dirt that can cause skin irritations and infections.
